00006 // mingw needs this to enable some newer 64-bit functions
00007 #ifdef __MINGW32__
00008 #   undef  __MSVCRT_VERSION__
00009 #   define __MSVCRT_VERSION__ 0x800
00010 #endif
00011 
00012 // set minimum win32 API requirement to Windows 2000 or higher
00013 #ifndef _WIN32_WINNT
00014 #   define _WIN32_WINNT 0x0500
00015 #endif 
00016 #ifndef WINVER
00017 #   define WINVER 0x0500
00018 #endif

00064 // fprintf macros for unsigned types - mingw32 is a good source if more needed
00065 #define PRId8   "d"
00066 #define PRId16  "d"
00067 #define PRId32  "d"
00068 #define PRId64  "I64d"
00069 
00070 #define PRIu8   "u"
00071 #define PRIu16  "u"
00072 #define PRIu32  "u"
00073 #define PRIu64  "I64u"
00074 
00075 #define PRIx8   "x"
00076 #define PRIx16  "x"
00077 #define PRIx32  "x"
00078 #define PRIx64  "I64x"
00079 
00081 
00082 // some macros for constant expressions
00083 #define INT8_C(x)    x
00084 #define INT16_C(x)   x
00085 #define INT32_C(x)   x ## L
00086 #define INT64_C(x)   x ## LL
00087 
00088 #define UINT8_C(x)   x
00089 #define UINT16_C(x)  x
00090 #define UINT32_C(x)  x ## UL
00091 #define UINT64_C(x)  x ## ULL
